Setting Workfile Locations

The workfile location is initially set during project creation; using Set Workfile Location allows you to override the current location and set the default location for checking in, getting, and checking out workfiles. (You are still able to override this default location when you perform those functions.)

The workfile location is stored in the workspace assigned to the project database. If the workspace is public, the specified workfile location affects all users who will access the project or file using the public workspace. If the workspace is private, the specified workfile location will not affect other users.

If you delete the workfile location for a project while working in the root workspace, the workfile location for that project will set to the root project database directory.

To set the workfile location for a file or project:

  1. Select the file or project.

  2. Select File | Set Workfile Location or File | Properties | Workspace Settings tab.

  3. Enter or browse to select the default location for checking in, getting, and checking out workfiles.

  4. Click OK.
